name: BOMB-O-GRAMS
description:
Use the clues you are given to uncover the right panels without blowing yourself up or hitting the time limit! You know - kind of like in Minesweeper! Or Picross??? It's some type of hybrid, surely!

Ten levels of fun and incrementing challenge await you...


THE STORY WITH THIS ONE - Yeah so after witnessing the leaderboard of my last score-based game get HTML 'hacked', I figured I should go and make future projects 'o mine be moreso about the PROGRESSION and journey to a definitive end. Let me know if that worked out and if this one proves satisfying to complete! Or if its too easy even! I worry about that as well!!!

I also totally wanted to make this one as just an excuse to give the 'remake' treatment to another old game of mine: 'BOOMBOARD!',  Game devs really DO only have couple repeating ideas don't they... Constant refinement is just too tempting!!!
